Table.PRT_Q: What is the reading mainly about?
Table.PRT_CHOICE1: The first two men to fly around the world
Table.PRT_CHOICE2: The first solar plane to fly around the world
Table.PRT_CHOICE3: The longest flight around the world
Table.PRT_CHOICE4: The first people to make their own plane and fly around the world

Table.PRT_Q: How long did Piccard and Borschberg’s trip take?
Why did Bertrand Piccard and Andre Borschberg want to do this voyage?
Table.PRT_CHOICE1: To show people how smart they are
Table.PRT_CHOICE2: To make people think about buying their plane
Table.PRT_CHOICE3: To make people see how slow renewable energy is
Table.PRT_CHOICE4: To make people think more about renewable energy
